    CommandLine - Class in com.xml.editor
    The CommandLine class handles the parsing and execution of XML editor commands from the command-line interface.

    Compresses the provided XML data using byte pair encoding.

    convertToJson(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.xml.editor.mainApplication

    Creates a corresponding closing tag for a given opening tag.
    createNewFile(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.xml.editor.mainApplication

    createOpeningTag(String) - Static method in class com.xml.editor.XMLTagUtils
